DOC.brief_summary: To study the effect of mild laser treatment on the incidence of exudative complications in soft drusen maculopathy. We hypothesise that mild laser treatment causing a proliferation of the retinal pigment epithelium and enhancing the capacity of clearing drusen material from Bruch's membrane.
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Laser Treatment of Drusen Maculopathy
DOC.criteria: > 55 years of age, Soft drusen maculopathy, VA 0.81.0 VA <0.8, Pigment clumps, PED, CNV, Atrophy, Haemorrhage, Diabetes retinopathy, Sign cataract, Glaucoma
